trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> for the sizing template of the right border of a small window.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameRightSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameRightSizingTemplate> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the sizing template of the right border of a small window, such as a tool window.
Gets a visual style element that represents the sizing template of the right border of a small window.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameRightSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the sizing template of the right border of a small window.
